scripts.setup: yarn install && cd apps/llm-backend && pip3 install -r requirements.txt && cd .. && cd web && yarn install
scripts.clean: yarn workspaces foreach --all run clean && rm -rf node_modules && yarn clean:python
scripts.clean:python: cd apps/llm-backend && rm -rf __pycache__ .pytest_cache && find . -name '*.egg-info' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true
